mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.nick as writer from t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser=B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_board_img C ON A.iboard=C.iboard GROUP BY A.iboard ORDER BY A.cntFav DESC, A.iboard DESC limit 9

SELECT B.iboard, B.iuser,E.nick AS writer ,B.title, B.cntFav, B.season, C.img_addr FROM t_board_fav A INNER JOIN t_board B ON A.iboard=B.iboard INNER JOIN t_user E ON B.iuser=E.iuser LEFT JOIN t_board_img C ON A.iboard=C.iboard WHERE A.iuser=${iuser} GROUP BY B.iboard ORDER BY iboard desc LIMIT ${startPage},9;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, B.nick, C.img_addr FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser=B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_board_img C ON A.iboard=C.iboard WHERE A.iuser=${iuser})D GROUP BY D.iboard ORDER BY D.iboard desc LIMIT ${startPage},9
select ifnull(C, 0) from (SELECT CEIL(COUNT(iboard)/${limit}) C FROM t_board WHERE iuser=${iuser}) B
select ifnull(C, 0) from (SELECT CEIL(COUNT(iboard)/${limit}) as C FROM t_board_fav WHERE iuser=${iuser}) B
